website_summaries.verdict: Affordable knife from a reputable brand with updated knife technology.
pros: EdgeKeeper technology features a self-sharpening knife sheath
cons: Feels a bit lighter compared to other paring knives

customer_reviews.title: Will go dull quickly, sheaths don't sharpen.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the supposed edge guard in the sheathing of these knives, they don't hold an edge to save their lives. The speed at which they lose an edge is almost disturbing, if I'm going to be perfectly honest. I've seen budget kitchen knives from the dollar store that can keep an edge longer.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Dull blade and looks like a weapon
customer_reviews.text: I got this knife as a santoku blade so it looked less assuming a work, but you can see in the picture that the sheath is still pointy because they use the same sheath for both blade types. This thing looks like a scary weapon at work and I don’t feel comfortable using it. It’s so cheap I won’t go through the effort of returning. The blade is so dull, you might as well use a butter knife. It says self sharpening, but it doesn’t work and every time you pull the blade out, you have to wipe off metal dust before you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Has gotten dull
customer_reviews.text: My mom really enjoys this knife as it is the sharpest in the kitchen now. It cuts through chicken like butter, and the size of it makes cutting anything a breeze. Edit: as of 7/6/16 it has already gotten dull and the built in sharpener does nothing. I prefer sharpening it with another that actually does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great paring knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this little paring knife. It's got a nice sharp blade (and I mean sharp, I was rinsing it and accidentally cut my finger pushing some tomato seeds off--totally my fault, of course), and the handle is a good shape and size. I can't speak to the sharpener case yet, though I haven't noticed any dulling of the blade, so maybe it is working? If not, knives are easy enough to sharpen, but since the knife is so sharp, it's a good thing to use when putting in the drawer so that no one accidentally cuts themselves reaching for something near it. I would buy this paring knife again if I hadn't already.
customer_reviews.author: TollyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would be a good purchase, it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a good purchase, it wasn't. The EdgeKeeper sheath is worthless, the knife is always dull and when we tried to us a different sharpener on it, it just did not perform well, but I guess it's because it is not of good quality. If you want a good, sharp knife, this is NOT the knife you want.
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Fair knife
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for its price I thought it would be a bit more sharp but it's not that sharp nor is it a dull knife almost cut my finger using it however it didn't go through my nail like my other knife has done so it still cuts the things I want to cut but suprised me that it didn't go through my finger, always keep in mind when using this knife especially for work wipe your blade when you pull it out of the case since it will have some metal shavings from being sharpened and we don't want to serve people a side of metal with their food whether it's a miniscule amount it's still there
customer_reviews.author: Lynark

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp and user friendly knife. The grip is great for anyone. It fits in your hand, not clunky like some knife handles are. You get a nice clean cut each time you use. The blade stays sharp thanks to the sharpener that was cleverly placed right on the blade cover. As you pull out the knife - it sharpens. Great product for the kitchen. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alison O

customer_reviews.title: Not as sharp as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these "self sharpening" knives because although I have TONS of knives, none of them cuts a roast or other late piece of meat (like a turkey) smoothly. I always end up with a lot of shredded meat. When I used one of these to carve a brisket of beef this week, that's exactly what I got. Shredded meat. Not one slice! On the other hand, the middle size knife (I forget the name, sorry) chops up vegetables very well.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll P

customer_reviews.title: Showed up very dull
customer_reviews.text: Blades are thick and grips are nice but they showed up extremely dull. It was like I was expected to sharpen them to my liken. I have a Work Sharp belt sharpener and worked with them for an hour and they are still pretty dull. I threw away the package before I tested them so now I’m stuck with them. Hopefully I can get them sharp one day. I’ve never had a knife show up without a great factory edge, it’s blowing my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. A cheap utility knife to do lightweight cutting around the house and yard, with sheath so that I can carry it around safely. Beautiful design. Not particularly sharp but I don't want something super sharp and dangerous. This is perfect for cutting duct tape. Love it! Highly recommended for lightweight cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be sharpened frequently
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes for such a cheap knife, but it does the job well enough. I was worried about the blade snapping off, but so far it hasn't snapped off even when I'm cutting a cabbage or other large objects. However, the sharpener that comes with the knife does more harm than good, so I would avoid using it. I bought a good sharpener with the knife because it needs to be sharpened very frequently. For reference, I sharpen it after I cut two large onions. This is by no means a professional knife, but for someone learning to cook, this isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Arpan

customer_reviews.title: This knife is dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is dull the begin with and the sheath only sharpens per of the blade. I have years of experience with chef knives but cut myself deeply with this knife twice when it slipped instead of cut. It’s terribly light which just makes it worse. If you buy this, keep it on its sheath. The blade feels (as in when it slices open your thumb) like it’s got tiny serrations.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D. Tuchler

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Not sharp at all - even with the built-in sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Not sharp. 2. built-in sharpener keeps falling off case. would not recommend this product. not a good knife. spend more and get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Ram

customer_reviews.title: Super Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the size I wanted. It is definitely super sharp and I now have a nice scar on my finger to prove it. That's honestly what I get for trying to de-pit an avocado like on TV instead of like a normal person. The cut was very precise though, 10/10. It's also stayed sharp, especially with a swipe of the sharpener when pulling it out.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Dullest Knife EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER THIS it is CRAP! I tried to cut a grapefruit and it wouldn't even go through the skin. I tried the sharpener it came with...no edge at all!! I've had spoons sharper than this knife. I got out my really good sharpener and tried getting some kind of edge on this knife. NO WAY it still won't cut anything. The only this it's good for is spreading butter. My husband didn't believe till he tried to get an edge on it. This knife will not get sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Dull Blade and not worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Knife for chopping up big hard fruits and veggies such as Watermelon, pineapple, onions, potatoes, etc. But this isn't giving the work that it should. The Blade is very dull and a few times I saved my self from slipping it and cutting my fingers. Not worth the money. Not suggesting to anyone. Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa S.

customer_reviews.title: This knife is extremely sharp!
customer_reviews.text: A nice knife but please be very careful when using it because it's very sharp. The cover is also a sharpener and does its job well so every time you take it out or put it back in, it gets a razor's edge. It slices through even tough things easily and cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Jute196

customer_reviews.title: Our camp kitchen knife
customer_reviews.text: Added this knife to our camping box. The requirement was that it had a sheath and was large enough so we only needed one for the box. Both criteria were met. We've only used it on a few camp trips, so I cannot say if the self-sharpening sheath is actually working, but in theory it's a great idea. It is very sharp and easily sliced and diced our fruits and veggies on our camping excursions.
customer_reviews.author: Carly B.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Pitting on side of blade
customer_reviews.text: I found the knife to be of the right size for me . Good concept , sharpens itself ..... BUT !!! what I have found is the sides of the blade is pitting !! I do think that they could have put more thought into this , even though some will say you get what you pay for ..... which is true ...... but no matter what you pay for a product you expect it to be as claimed . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is amazing. We’ve been using basic, dull knives for the last few years and tried sharpening it and everything, but they just suck. One day we were trying to cut fish and it was so bad, we’d be better off karate chopping it. I believe you should wash it immediately to keep the knife sharp, but it has its own sharpening cover you place it in. Overall, great knife and cuts (lack of a better phrase) like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: So far...so good
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a month. Love that it’s self sharpening. Time will tell how it holds an edge. I actually got this for our RV coach to protect accidental cuts from being in a drawer with a bunch of unrelated items. The sheath is the important part; the sharpener is the bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good but rusts easily
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, it says to wash n dry immediately I'll give them that, within one week I let it sit in water I guess too long bc it rusted 😩😣☹️ so although it's a great knife it's kinda not practical, not for me anyway
customer_reviews.author: raxirax

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Dull Knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of those and they both were terrible. Absolutely blunt. Not sharp at all. I don't know if I got lemon, but these are not sharp. Nor I could sharp them with the sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Shah

customer_reviews.title: The best utility knife I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 1/2-inch utility knife because I wanted something for all of my various cutting needs. I love to cook, and the blades I've been using have been lacking, even the more expensive ones. I was so happy that this knife had a sheath with an edge keeper. I used it for the first time today. It was fabulous! Not only did it cut vegetables beautifully, but it also sliced chicken breasts as if I were slicing through softened butter. I am in LOVE and just ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cutrera

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Not too large and not too small this knife is the perfect size for me. Stays nice and sharp with the built in sharpener and does an amazing job slicing and dicing. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: ahappy65

customer_reviews.title: Good knife, mistakenly thought it was ceramic
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this knife by mistake, thinking it was ceramic as I owned other Farberware knives that are ceramic. However, this knife is working perfectly good and the sharpening sheath is a great feature in my opinion, so I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Segura

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectation
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a replacement and this has low price and has no problem cutting up meat and occasionally bones. The sharpener is also easy to use and knife itself is relatively light. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is the bomb.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife as a travel knife. I am a vegetarian and like to make most of my meals when I travel. The knife has a good feel and balance especially for an inexpensive knife, and it comes with a cover for the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: great knife
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these knives and love them. They stay very sharp and protected in their holders and are comfortable to use on my arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, flawed sheath
customer_reviews.text: The knife itself is great, it’s my go to knife - it’s the sheath that I have a problem with, the sharpener pops out almost every time I take the knife out.
customer_reviews.author: MCollett

customer_reviews.title: Stay sharp
customer_reviews.text: With the sleeves they can be put it drawer and will not lose their edge.
customer_reviews.author: Emzilla

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is fine. The knife didn't arrive overly sharp. But if one pulls it through the sharpener a number of time it improves the edge.
customer_reviews.author: MATT LOMAX

customer_reviews.title: This is not sharp at all
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied at all with this knife. It is not sharp at all. I will have to take it somewhere to have it sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beste

customer_reviews.title: Loving to cleave
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this cleaver for my meat and vegetables as well as my fruits. Great blade. Worth my investment.
customer_reviews.author: ELI B.

customer_reviews.title: Self sharpener included
customer_reviews.text: Very good price. The included sharpener is why I purchased this particular knife. I had a ceramic paring knife that I absolutely loved but it chipped very easily and soon became non functional. This one should last and stay sharp for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dona B. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to cooking and this knife with a build in sharpener was a perfect purchase. It’s been through hell and lasted while I learn. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jenocidal

customer_reviews.title: Great small knife with extras
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can sharpen easy and it's all integrated I to the sheath also very sharp out the package
customer_reviews.author: 1Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves it. Says it stays sharp and cuts great. She has small hands, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than i thought
customer_reviews.text: I like how it comes with the sharpening cover, but i wish the knife was a little bigger and sharper
customer_reviews.author: chris ty

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knives, I like that when you put them back in their holder, that is sharpens them as well. Great product. Would order if need more. I ordered 4
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad small for my taste
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad small for my taste but the quality is good. I decided to keep this because I like the idea of the self sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: the sharpening tool in the sleeve is the best: ) a few swipes and hone is on
customer_reviews.text: the sharpening tool in the sleeve is the best:) a few swipes and hone is on. ready for easy slicing of ANY kitchen foods:)
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Combs

customer_reviews.title: I know sounds lame but I love them
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same set of knives since I went to college 33 years ago. I asked for these knives for Christmas. I know sounds lame but I love them. It is amazing going from dull knives to sharp ones. They cut through a tomato without squishing it. Slides through the fat and gristle in meat. I am 100% satisfied after 2 months of use. Oh Yeah, did I mention I cook dinner at home approximately 350 days a year?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dulling after about 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. Started dulling in about 5 weeks, not used every day either. Thinking it should have stayed sharp longer.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this nice almost everyday for the past month, and I am very happy with my purchase. Knife is ergonomic, the sharpener in the sheath seems to work. Very good value
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My favorite knife.
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. The cover also sharpens when putting the knife away. Always sharp. Using a steel once in awhile really enhances the edge
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great knife - Perfect for slicing fruit
customer_reviews.text: I use this one at work to slice breakfast/lunch apple's, salami etc. This is better than a pocket knife since the blade is thinner. An added bonus is the sleeve that includes a sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: S. Petursson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This knife cuts smooth af. It's nice the holder has a built in sharpener. Did notice water marks after left in sink overnight like rust. I make sure to wash it right after use. This cuts better than chefs knife I spent 50 bucks on.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my job
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I work as a food runner and need to prep garnishes and fruits. Not a lot, but enough to dull a knife in a day. Being able to sharpen as I go without waiting to use one of the kitchen tools is great.Also got my coworker one, after she kept complimenting it.
customer_reviews.author: Kamarrei

customer_reviews.title: Stays sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and liked it so much I bought a couple more for my mom and sister. If it’s tough to insert it I found that giving it a little squeeze at the base of the sleeve helps a lot. Great quality and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Super shopper

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving Image, not is NOT a ceramic knife.
customer_reviews.text: The image used for this product shows a knife with a white ceramic blade. I found this knife by searching for “ceramic knives” but this is NOT ceramic. Very deceiving image being used to sell this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for cutting bait and wanted a paring knife that had a case - I love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nothing spectacular. But then again it was an add on item.
customer_reviews.text: The knife needed sharpening after we received it. The knife is also thicker so cuts seem to need a bit more power. I would say this is an average knife but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool
customer_reviews.text: What a great little tool for the kitchen. The built in sharpener is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: The design for this is awesome i love the cover and for a cleaver its not to bad, I use to cut thru chicken, beef and pork bones. The built in sharpener is cool but could use some work on location of it.
customer_reviews.author: Unko

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife, bought one for friend and had to get one for myself. Great that it sharpens every time you pull it out of sheaf.
customer_reviews.author: shawn quinn

customer_reviews.title: A useful knife
customer_reviews.text: While returning the knife into the sheath/sharpener can be problematic, the blade is keenly sharp and most definitely does the job for cooking preparation and quick opening of packaged foods when scissors or such are not immediately on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Domino

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is sharp and lasts, this is the second one i buy, the first one still usable
customer_reviews.author: Nesreen

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for keeping a paring knife sharp!
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to always have a safe and sharp knife!
customer_reviews.author: TH in DC

customer_reviews.title: Great Paring Knife For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Handy knife for cutting fruit or veges and I love the self sharpener!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery N Chase

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well. I'm sure it's what you expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, it is cheap and already rusted after a few weeks. File runs out super fast. I've had a knife from the dollar tree for like 4 years and it cuts better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Garce

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: Built in sharpener seems like a good idea but is awkward to use and potentially dangerous. Knives came pretty dull. I expected higher quality based on previous Faberware purchases.
customer_reviews.author: arJ

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not the sharpest, edge dulls easily and the knife chips often even with careful use. But it is fairly inexpensive. I wouldn't give it as a gift, but for lite home use it does the job for 3 to 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: OM42BRAZ

customer_reviews.title: These knives are mediocre at best the self sharpener wants to pop out when trying ...
customer_reviews.text: These knives are mediocre at best the self sharpener wants to pop out when trying to sharpen the knives. But when you do get it to work it does get them really sharp so watch your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kcirtap Llocsird

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite knife!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super picky about my knives and I still cannot believe I found this one online and for such a great price! I love the built in sharpener. Saves me from getting my sharpening wand out. The sheath is durable and allows me to store this knife in a drawer!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory M Huss

customer_reviews.title: Blade rusted after first use.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. After it's first hand washing and allowing to air-dry small rust spots started showing up on the blade. Still sharp, but relegated to the toolbox in the shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dull knife but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: it’s cheap at $12. Con: it was never sharp. And it gets dull quickly. The built in sharpener doesn’t help much. Giving it 3 stars because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kuan

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: This knife is sharp and will cut anything. Make sure you clean and dry the knife before you put it back in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: wonderful addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller knife for chopped and slicing. This is the perfect size, and it's SHARP,SHARP, SHARP
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: I know sounds lame but I love them
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same set of knives since I went to college 33 years ago. I asked for these knives for Christmas. I know sounds lame but I love them. It is amazing going from dull knives to sharp ones. They cut through a tomato without squishing it. Slides through the fat and gristle in meat. I am 100% satisfied after 2 months of use. Oh Yeah, did I mention I cook dinner at home approximately 350 days a year?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Super little knife. Love the fact that it sharpens itself. Bought it for our RV. Loved the idea of having a sheath in which to store it. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy and comfortable to use. The built-in sharpener keeps the edge ready to go
customer_reviews.author: Edward Finstein

customer_reviews.title: i use this for chicken and it is really nice, we have ceramic farberware knife and for some ...
customer_reviews.text: i use this for chicken and it is really nice, we have ceramic farberware knife and for some reason that one isn't really comparable with this. knife is sharp and i had slight cut on finger while wiping with kitchen towels
customer_reviews.author: Regular Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Decent knife
customer_reviews.text: My only concern on thus product us that my case for the knife tends to give me some trouble when putting knife away I fear that the self sharpen sheath will in time damage the blade instead of sharpen it aside from that great knife really useful
customer_reviews.author: Lynark

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I do a lot of prepping bone in meat and thing thing goes right through it! The weight really helps!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: This knife comes nowhere close to the sharpness of Zyliss knives I have bought in the past. It looks nice and has a nice case but if you want it for peeling potatoes then it does not work well. I will buy Zyliss again.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Won't get another
customer_reviews.text: Like most sharpening sheaths it doesn't do that job well at all. I didn't think it came sharp enough when brand new. I gave it the test of time, not another silly review when unboxed.
customer_reviews.author: JASANDTHOM8

customer_reviews.title: I lost my favorite knife. Saw this one and had to try ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost my favorite knife. Saw this one and had to try it. I love it. It fits my hand nicely. Love that I can sharpen it when I need to just by pulling it out of the holder. Will be purchasing more like this.
customer_reviews.author: wend

customer_reviews.title: Best knife i own
customer_reviews.text: My NEW favorite knife. It cuts so well. Defiantly going to be my new go to gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CANT GO WRONG WITH FABERWARE BRAND
customer_reviews.text: Have all their knives and bakeware. Super quality, heavy duty. Great buy with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: tweetybirdie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This knife does not work well at all. It's not sharp enough. Don't waste your money. Invest in a $70 japanese knife that will cut well and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: the times I've used it I liked it. sharpens every time you use it like ...
customer_reviews.text: was given as a gift to my mom, the times I've used it I liked it. sharpens every time you use it like it says.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: ... or 2 use Stained by just pizza sauce not great
customer_reviews.text: After 1 or 2 use Stained by just pizza sauce not great quality
customer_reviews.author: Luis Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: they stay sharp
customer_reviews.text: we sent to friends in Tennessee, they seem to really like them
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Owens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be better; sharp and the sheath protects the blade in the utility drawer as well as your fingers when you reach for it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goldfield

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Its not what I expected. I thought the knife will be sharper
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not a good knife. Bot sharp and loses the sharpness so fast and the knife sharpener sucks tbh
customer_reviews.author: gio

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS KNIFE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS KNIFE!! I CAN'T BELIEVE A HEAD OF CABBAGE IS SO EASY TO CUT THROUGH. I ALWAYS HAD TO ASK MY SON TO CUT FOR ME BUT THIS KNIFE GOES RIGHT THROUGH IT WITH EASE... THANK YOU FARBERWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: dotjt1

customer_reviews.title: Good sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a multi-purpose knife that didn't constantly dull and I'm very happy with this purchase. I've been using this one since it came out of the box for all of my cooking. The knife slices through everything really well, and it's such a great feature to have a freshly sharpened knife each time you take it out of the sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad listing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a ceramic knife and this one was listed right in the middle of the ceramic knifes. It isn't ceramic. I will keep it, but you should fix your listing.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great knives that stay sharpened all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great knives that stay sharpened all the time. Good handle and feel weighted well. These do get hand washed only but they are still fairly new so I am not expecting any issues.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Cut the best way..cuts so dang well.
customer_reviews.text: Came with safe sharpener.. knife is best I now own. Handy..very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Waters

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality, and very nice to keep in knife protector.
customer_reviews.author: Ram3063

customer_reviews.title: Sharp !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all.... very sharp.... i use it weekly on chicken breast and its very sharp.... A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Goonie

customer_reviews.title: Safe Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: Knife just what I needed for small kitchen chores and the sheath is a must, both for sharpening and to keep the blade safe from children and pets.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Stays sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Clean it & store in the case. Sharp knife always at hand!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: The built-in sharpener in the case is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time because it’s sharp every time I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed about this product, I got it for my dad as a Christmas gift. The first time he went to use it the metal completely chipped off. Guess that’s what I get for buying a cheap product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Dullest knife I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Dullest to the point of being useless ..... Strange because the 5 inch version arrived very sharp out of the package. Work for an hour reforming the edge and have it up to the point of just being normally dull.... Just not worth the effort
customer_reviews.author: Aida Green

product_meta.title: Farberware EdgeKeeper Paring Knife, 3.5-Inch, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style Name:3.5-Inch Paring KnifeFarberware is the #1 selling cutlery brand in the U. S. (Source: the npd Group, /retail tracking service. 52 weeks ending March 2016). Farberware Edge keeper knives feature a sheath with innovated technology that is designed to automatically sharpen the blade with each use. The edge keeper protective sheath contains a built-in mechanism that hones the blade before and after each use, maintaining a blade's razor-sharp edge. The blade is made from high-carbon steel that lends strength, sharpness, and durability. Knives are not dishwasher safe. Hand-wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately.
feature_bullets: EDGEKEEPER TECHNOLOGY: Farberware Edgekeeper Knives feature a sheath with innovated technology that is designed to automatically sharpen the blade with each use. Never worry about a dull blade before use

SELF SHARPENING: The EdgeKeeper protective sheath contains a built-in mechanism that hones the blade before and after each use, maintaining a blade's razor-sharp edge. The built in self-sharpening technology guarantees a sharp blade for each use
HIGH-QUALITY BLADE: The blade is made from high-carbon steel that lends strength, sharpness, and durability and will resist rust
COMFORT GRIP: This knife offers an ergonomically designed handle for exceptional comfort and durability while using. Never worry about discomfort when using.
EASY CARE: Hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately; wipe protective, self sharpening sheath as needed with a damp cloth
Farberware is the #1 selling cutlery brand in the U.S. (Source: The NPD Group)
